summary: This added new set of armor hight resolution textures, for male and female, all races work too.

Thanks hodilton by video
[size=4]Description[/size]

LC Defender of Skyrim Armor

This armor is complete set for Male and Female and all races, Higth resolution 2048 x 2048 with many details.

I did 90% of the textures in Adobe Photoshop manually (which took me a long time) and some more minor adaptation of the 3D models.


Armor can be crafted at the forge, you need the "steel perk" and have a light and a heavy version.


The strength of the armor is equivalent to ebony and can be improved at a workbench.


The Armor includes:

Defender boots

Defender armor

Defender gloves

Defender shield

Defender Helm

Defender Mask (is helm complete)
